messages.body: $AAPL "He experimented with the iPad that 2014 season but was razzed and discouraged about it by Tigers veterans." https://www.boston.com/sports/boston-red-sox/2018/07/14/j-d-martinez-and-his-bp-ipad-no-longer-a-laughing-matter

links.title: J.D. Martinez and his BP iPad no longer a laughing matter
links.description: BOSTON (AP) - Teammates have long stopped laughing at J.D. Martinez and his iPad. Boston's All-Star slugger is serious about every swing he takes, even in batting practice, and he has the tape to prove it. Get to the park early enough for Red Sox BP, and you'll see a pair of iPads attached to tripods, one on each side of the batting cage.

links.title: Former (Real) EPA Chief: Big Oil Is "Peddling Misinformation" About Electric Cars
links.description: Christine Todd Whitman served as head of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) under President George W. Bush back in 2001-2003. With experience having worked intimately with (and regulating) the energy industries, it should come as no surprise that she witnessed efforts from the oil industry to undermine clean energy solutions.

links.title: $AAPL The Bullish Option Trade After an Earnings Rip in Apple Inc
links.description: If you've ever seen a stop rip off of earnings and wondered if that was a signal for a trade, or if the momentum would continue, then this is exactly the back-test you are after. We call it "star gazing" when a stock rips and we're stuck -- with no idea what to expect next.

messages.body: Despite Analyst Concerns, Apple Continues To Innovate $AAPL https://seekingalpha.com/article/4187308

links.title: Despite Analyst Concerns, Apple Continues To Innovate
links.description: On July 13, an analyst at Bernstein suggested Apple ( AAPL) is underinvesting in innovation. This suggestion is based on a regression that shows that Apple's gross margins are higher than you'd expect, given the spending on research and development.
